page.description: The O directive allows you to specify the formatting of a button's label. When you have multiple directives in a Format string, you separate them with semi-colons ";".

argument.name: {I= N }
argument.description: Numeric. Optional. Sequence number of image previously specified by a %I= Image_Name % directive. Inserted at any position.
